content.rendered:
As the name suggests, Red Rose Royal Basmati Rice is best suited for royal dishes like Hyderabadi Dum Biryani, Zafrani Pulao, Kashmiri Pulao, Awadhi Pulao, etc. We ensure that this rice will turn your meals into indulgent feasts.
Its nutty, floral aroma & soft, fluffy texture works well in many authentic Asian & Indian dishes. After cooking, these aromatic, silken grains soften and bloom elegantly, making the flavorful rice suitable for special preparations like an elegant festive Pulav or Hyderabadi Biryani.
Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • Red Rose Premium Quality Rice
  • XXXL size grain (Pure 1121 Basmati)
  • Best aroma, flavor & aged to perfection
  • Suitable for indulgent feasts like Hyderabadi Dum Biryani
  • Pearl white grains that do not stick to each other
